name: Rina Meushaw
what_you_do: ADHD & Executive Function Coach helping moms (especially those with ADHD) build systems and strategies to manage life, work, and family.
who_you_serve: Women, particularly working moms with ADHD, including those in the Jewish community.
social_proof: MBA (2004), Certified Professional Coach by iPEC (2020), Associate Certified Coach by International Coaching Federation (2022), Professional Certified Coach by International Coaching Federation (2024), CHADD member (2025), host of the Balanced Working Moms Podcast.
business_focus: Coaching women with ADHD to build practical systems for managing work, family, and daily life.
service_provided: ADHD coaching, executive function coaching, life coaching, breathwork, mindfulness and meditation, positive psychology
